mapper.update: UPDATE contents SET is_accepted = 1 WHERE content_id=#{VALUE}
UPDATE contents SET is_accepted = -1 WHERE content_id=#{VALUE}
mapper.select: SELECT c.content_id, c.content_name, c.content_sum, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.writer_id, f.funding_id, f.detail, f.transaction, f.production_cost, f.purpose, f.min_invest FROM contents c JOIN funding_contents f ON c.content_id = f.content_id WHERE c.end_day < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND c.content_sum > c.target
